heroSection.title: How can we help you?
heroSection.subTitle: Search our knowledge base or get in touch with our support team

SupportFAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions

trackOrder.q: How do I track my order?
trackOrder.a: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the 'Orders' section. Click on the order you want to track to see real-time updates.

returnPolicy.a: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Products must be unused and in original packaging. Free return shipping for defective items.

shippingTime.a: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping is available for 1-2 day delivery. International orders typically arrive within 7-14 days.

paymentMethods.q: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.a: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. All transactions are secure and encrypted.

updateAccount.q: How do I change my account information?
updateAccount.a: Log into your account and navigate to Settings. From there you can update your email, password, shipping addresses, and payment methods.

internationalShipping.a: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide. International shipping costs and delivery times vary by destination.

cancelOrder.q: How do I cancel an order?
cancelOrder.a: Orders can be cancelled within 1 hour of placement. Go to your order history, select the order, and click 'Cancel Order'. After 1 hour, please contact support.

damagedItem.q: What if I receive a damaged item?
damagedItem.a: We're sorry to hear that! Please contact us within 48 hours with photos of the damaged item. We'll send a replacement or issue a full refund immediately.

SupportFAQ.noResults: No results found. Try a different search term or contact support.
